result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: ADA Colleen Lennon appeared for the State. Attorney Allegra L. Berry appeared in person with Defn. STC scheduled, NIH.
Status conference on December 2, 2022 at 10:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: and notice of DNA and witness list - State's
Defendant appeared in person and went to SPD to apply for attorney. Defendant returned to Court, has been approved for SPD. STC scheduled, NIH.
Status conference on October 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Signed bond not returned; bail held
Pre-trial conference on August 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Jodi D except only through a third party and only for the purposes of communicating regarding their common child(ren). 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Grant K or Ashley W. 
- Defendant shall not be in the 500 block of Gannon Ave in Madison. 
Trial Judge - Br 2 

Defendant has acknowledged and agreed to terms and conditions of bond. Defendant must return signed bond form within 10 days of today. Any bail money previously posted will not be returned until a signed bond form is on file with the Clerk of Courts.

10:32 AM Case re-called. Defendant appeared.  Hector Al-Homsi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Appearances by victims. All parties by Zoom. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Dustin M Sobacki

Prior: 4283 Argosy Ct, Madison, WI 53714
09:55 AM Defendant logged in to Zoom court session, indicated prior technical difficulties. State will attempt to contact victims and case will be re-called at 10:30 AM session.

09:22 AM Defendant did not appear.  Hector Al-Homsi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Appearances by victims. All parties by Zoom. Warrant and copy of Complaint given to the Sheriff's Office to attempt to serve.
